thread.title: Friends of Weston Library to host book sale
thread.title_full: Friends of Weston Library to host book sale

title: Friends of Weston Library to host book sale
text: Print this article Advertisement WESTON â€” Friends of Weston Library (FOWL) will host their annual used book sale October 23-24 in conjunction with the Potato Show. Books and other media for sale will be displayed in the downstairs club room of Memorial Hall, 210 E. Main St. Book sale hours will be Friday, Oct. 23 from 4-7 p.m., and Saturday, Oct. 24 from 9 a.m.-4 p.m. Prices will be $1 for hardcover books, and $. 50 for paperbacks. There will be a $1 per bag sale from 3-4 p.m. Saturday. Proceeds from the sale will contribute to materials and programs at the Weston Public Library. To donate gently used books, call the library at 541-566-2378, or Kathleen McCullough at 541-566-3916.
